title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still receive an 'Invalid Credentials' error. Issue started 2 hours ago.

title: Broken Image Link on Product Page
description: The main image for 'Product X' on the live site is a broken link (404 error). Affecting all customers viewing the page.

title: Request for Data Export Feature
description: Customer requires the ability to export their transaction history for the past year into a CSV file. Currently, the feature only allows 3-month exports.

title: System Downtime - API Not Responding
description: The main public API endpoint is returning a 500 server error since 10:00 AM UTC. This is affecting all integrated partners.

title: Typo on 'About Us' Page
description: There is a minor spelling mistake in the third paragraph of the 'Our Mission' section. The word 'responsible' is spelled 'responsable'.

title: Invoice Discrepancy for August Billing
description: Customer was double-charged for their subscription in August. They provided screenshots of both charges. Requires a refund of $59.99.

title: Mobile App Crash on iOS 17.5
description: The mobile application crashes immediately upon opening on iPhones running iOS version 17.5. Older iOS versions are unaffected. Affects approximately 15% of users.

title: Cannot Upload Files Larger Than 10MB
description: When attempting to upload a file over 10MB, the system times out. Error message: 'File Too Large'. Needs to be increased to 50MB.

title: Dashboard Metric Miscalculation
description: The 'Total Revenue' metric on the main dashboard is showing a value that is 10% lower than the actual value from the database. Needs immediate correction.

title: Improvement Suggestion: Dark Mode Option
description: Suggesting a new feature to add a 'Dark Mode' theme to the user interface for better accessibility and reduced eye strain.

title: Incorrect Timezone Display
description: All time stamps on the user profile are displaying in UTC instead of the user's selected timezone (PST).

title: Password Reset Email Not Arriving
description: Several users are reporting that the password reset email is not being delivered to their inboxes, even after checking spam folders.

title: Feature X Not Available for Tier 1 Users
description: Customer upgraded to Tier 1 but is still being prompted to upgrade to use 'Advanced Reporting'. License key needs to be updated.

title: Accessibility Concern: Low Contrast on Buttons
description: The contrast ratio between the text and background on 'Submit' buttons is too low, failing standards. Difficult for visually impaired users.

title: Can't Print Reports from Safari Browser
description: The printing functionality within the application is failing specifically on the Safari browser, but works fine on Chrome and Firefox.
